评论详情: These are some very sturdy and beautiful shoes. I was shocked with how comfortable they were. I it weren't for the heel. I would have thought these were socks! They are beyond soft, and after wearing all day, I wasn't tired, sore, and surprisingly, they didn't get dirty the way I thought. Not only that, but they are extremely warm! These are perfect for special events, fun night outs, and even dancing! I love how you don't need a zipper. Just pull the little loop on the top, and your feet will easily slip in. The color is gorgeous and has tiny glimmers in the cloth like material. I definitely recommend it and just get them, Mama!
Fit well, look great and comfortable

I got my normal size and these were too small but so so cute! the glitter detail in the material is adorable and the whole style is so trendy

评论概述: NEWBELLA MOUSSE FIT Women’s Knit Comfort Chunky Heeled Ankle Boots
评论详情: I LOVE these knit ankle boots. They're so cute and understated. I don't wear heels often so I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable they felt after I had them on for hours. They are pointy but I didn't find that to be a problem. I'm a 7.5 and I ordered a 7.5 and they fit fine with ankle socks. I really appreciate that they come with inserts so they won't lose shape. I keep my shoes in boxes but I appreciate the extra care taken in their packaging.
Very comfortable I love wearing them at the office so many compliments
I was hesitant ordering these shoes. I am happy I did. They are very nice, well constructed, fit true to size, look very cute.
